thread.title: All 6 James Bonds together at last... in wax form at Madame Tussauds - Movies
thread.title_full: All 6 James Bonds together at last... in wax form at Madame Tussauds - Movies News - Digital Spy

author: Tom Eames
title: All 6 James Bonds together at last... in wax form at Madame Tussauds - Movies
text: © Madame Tussauds Daniel Craig has made it clear he hates playing James Bond. Sean Connery refused to take part in a Bond retrospective. George Lazenby became a car salesman. The chances of a full-on 007 team-up are sadly slim.The next best thing? Immortalise them all in waxwork, of course. Madame Tussauds London has unveiled all six Bonds from Connery to Craig for a limited six-week attraction. Click the photo above for a closer look.Sean Connery, George Lazenby, Roger Moore, Timothy Dalton, Pierce Brosnan and Daniel Craig will then go on a tour of Tussauds attractions around the world on December 1. © Madame Tussauds Created in a partnership with Eon Productions, the waxworks feature the 007 agents in their classic dinner suits designed by Oscar-winner Lindy Hemming.It took 20 artists four months to complete the project, costing a whopping £150,000 for each model.The waxworks arrive in time for the latest Bond movie Spectre, which will open on October 26 in the UK and November 6 worldwide.
